name: Wick's Work Worry
description:
This is a solo student project as part of my game design degree module.  My first game made in Unreal 4 with custom assets and code.  The theme for the game was  fears  students have about and their college life. I chose the Fear of the Unknown and to create a sidescroller platformer.

Gameplay Description: 

A short, third person sidescroller platformer where you control "Wick" a student who finds themselves in a nightmare of their college.  

They must find all 30 pieces of their work and reach the exit, without taking too much damage to their Sanity.  Avoid traps and enemies that roam the twisted halls and escape the nightmare!

Feedback and critisim is welcomed and encouraged.

Thanks and hope you enjoy it!
